mapper.select: select wishlist.wishListNum, wishlist.wishListId, tour.tourNum, tour.tourname, tour.tourAddress, tour.tourContent, tour.tourUsetime from tour, wishlist where tour.tourNum = wishlist.wishListTourId and wishListId=1 order by wishListNum desc limit #{startRow}, #{pageBlock}
select count(*) totalRowsTour from wishList, tour where tour.tourNum = wishlist.wishListTourId and wishListId=1
select count(*) totalRowsFestival from wishList, festival where festival.festivalNum = wishlist.wishListFestivalId and wishListId=1
select * from member where id like #{searchWord}
select * from member where name like #{searchWord}
select count(*) total_rows from member where id like #{searchWord}
select count(*) total_rows from member where name like #{searchWord}
